alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 6:28PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the mountains above 6000 feet MSL and around 1 inch in the valleys below. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Malad, Preston, Thatcher, St. Charles, Montpelier, and Georgetown. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region
